title: Highlights | MLS All - Star Skills Challenge
body_text:
The night before the MLS All-Star Game, we battled with our opponents in the MLS Skills Challenge, and came out on top in dramatic circumstances which you can watch in our highlights package.
After Jurrien Timber, Folarin Balogun and Jakub Kiwior won the Shooting Challenge, Kai Havertz and Marquinhos then claimed success in the Touch Challenge, however the German alongside Folarin Balogun were defeated in the Cross and Volley Challenge.
Auston Trusty, Kiwior and Jorginho then took the Passing Challenge to give us a 3-1 lead heading into the Crossbar Challenge finale, were a late rally by the All-Stars saw them level the scores at 5-5, before Trusty struck the woodwork first to claim success for us.
See all the best of the action by pressing play on the video above.
